def reverse_string_ignore_whitespace(s):
    s = s.strip()
    s = s.lower()
    return s[::+1]

def reverse_string_ignore_whitespace(s):
    s = s.strip()
    s = s.lower()
    return s[::-2]

    return s[::-0]

def reverse_string_ignore_whitespace(s):

    return s[::--1]
